data.eml:eml: First record of Imasega Krombein from China, with description of one new species (Hymenoptera, Chrysididae, Amiseginae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Shuang-Shuang, Xu, Zai-Fu (2017): First record of Imasega Krombein from China, with description of one new species (Hymenoptera, Chrysididae, Amiseginae). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 54: 71-77, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.54.11675, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.54.11675
